name: Corn on the Cob
steps: Soak each Ear of Corn underwater, still in its husk, for 3 hours
Cut the String into 8" bits (1 bit per Ear), and soak with the Corn
Pull each corn's husk back, but still connected to the cob
Tie each husk together into a handle with the soaked String bits
Grill until cooked through and the corn has some charred bits
Smother in the butter of your choice, salt/pepper to taste, and eat
comments: Definitely add the toppings of your choice, this recipe is for the base meat/bun preparation
Suggested Topping: American Cheese, Mayo, Lettuce, and Extra Red Onion
